---CONSULTAR los archivos .parquet de vehicle_registration
USE electric_vehicle_explorer;
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_parquet/year=2024/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result];


--Indentifica los tipos de datos de las columnas en el archivo parquet
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''vehicle_registration_parquet/year=2024/month=01/'',
        DATA_SOURCE = ''electric_vehicle_data_bronze'',
        FORMAT = ''PARQUET''
    ) AS [result];'


--define columnas a consultar, el tipo y largo de datos
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_parquet/year=2024/month=01/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) WITH(
        vehicleId INT, 
        registrationDate DATETIME2(7)
    ) AS result;


--consultar carpetas usando uncaracter comodin(wildcard)
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_parquet/year=2024/month=01/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS vr_data;


--utilizar la funcion filename()
SELECT
    TOP 100
    vr_data.filename() AS filename,     --muestra el archivo de donde se obtiene cada registro
    vr_data.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_parquet/year=2024/month=01/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS vr_data;


--consultar subcarpetas
SELECT
    TOP 100
    vr_data.filepath() AS filepath,     --muestra la ruta del archivo de donde se obtiene cada registro
    vr_data.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_parquet/**',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS vr_data;


--utilizar la funcion filepath para seleccionar solo particiones especificas (año, mes)
SELECT vr_data.filepath(1) AS year,
    vr_data.filepath(2) AS month,
    count(1) AS record_count
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'vehicle_registration_parquet/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'electric_vehicle_data_bronze',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS vr_data
WHERE vr_data.filepath(1) = '2024'
        and vr_data.filepath(2) IN ('06','07','08')     --consulta los meses especificos del año 2024
GROUP BY vr_data.filepath(1), vr_data.filepath(2)
ORDER BY vr_data.filepath(1), vr_data.filepath(2);
